name: Zhiar's Tower Defense
description:
Info

A tower defense game made within 7 days of development. It will be expanded to feature more maps and more upgrades possibly, since originally 5 maps were planned but right now, only one has been implemented.

How to play

The basic rules of tower defense apply: Defend your base (the square points) from the enemies that spawn at the circle points. You can see your health at the top left of the screen.

Select a tower from the list or using your num keys to start placing it. You can view the stats of a tower by clicking on it and can also upgrade it and make it stronger.

From wave 0-100, every 20 waves is a goal. If you reach it for the first time, your map-rank is increased and you will gain 5 stardust to use for global upgrades. These can only be purchased in the main menu and are permanent.
